verses.text: And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, and \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* unto him out of the \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w* of the \w congregation|strong="H4150"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

\w Speak|strong="H1696"\w* unto the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, and \w say|strong="H0559"\w* unto them, If any \w man|strong="H0120"\w* of you \w bring|strong="H7126"\w* an \w offering|strong="H7133"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, ye shall \w bring|strong="H7126"\w* your \w offering|strong="H7133"\w* of the \w cattle|strong="H0929"\w*, \add even\add* of the \w herd|strong="H1241"\w*, and of the \w flock|strong="H6629"\w*.

If his \w offering|strong="H7133"\w* \add be\add* a burnt \w sacrifice|strong="H5930"\w* of the \w herd|strong="H1241"\w*, let him \w offer|strong="H7126"\w* a \w male|strong="H2145"\w* without \w blemish|strong="H8549"\w*: he shall \w offer|strong="H7126"\w* it of his own voluntary \w will|strong="H7522"\w* at the \w door|strong="H6607"\w* of the \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w* of the \w congregation|strong="H4150"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

And he shall \w put|strong="H5564"\w* his \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* upon the \w head|strong="H7218"\w* of the burnt \w offering|strong="H5930"\w*; and it shall be \w accepted|strong="H7521"\w* for him to make \w atonement|strong="H3722"\w* for him.

And he shall \w kill|strong="H7819"\w* the \w bullock|strong="H1121"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*: and the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w*, \w Aaron’s|strong="H0175"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, shall \w bring|strong="H7126"\w* the \w blood|strong="H1818"\w*, and \w sprinkle|strong="H2236"\w* the \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* round \w about|strong="H5439"\w* upon the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* that \add is by\add* the \w door|strong="H6607"\w* of the \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w* of the \w congregation|strong="H4150"\w*.
And he shall \w flay|strong="H6584"\w* the burnt \w offering|strong="H5930"\w*, and \w cut|strong="H5408"\w* it into his \w pieces|strong="H5409"\w*.

And the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* shall \w put|strong="H5414"\w* \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* upon the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*, and lay the \w wood|strong="H6086"\w* in \w order|strong="H6186"\w* upon the \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*:

And the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w*, \w Aaron’s|strong="H0175"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, shall \w lay|strong="H6186"\w* the \w parts|strong="H5409"\w*, the \w head|strong="H7218"\w*, and the \w fat|strong="H6309"\w*, in \w order|strong="H6186"\w* upon the \w wood|strong="H6086"\w* that \add is\add* on the \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* which \add is\add* upon the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*:

But his \w inwards|strong="H7130"\w* and his \w legs|strong="H3767"\w* shall he \w wash|strong="H7364"\w* in \w water|strong="H4325"\w*: and the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* shall \w burn|strong="H6999"\w* all on the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*, \add to be\add* a burnt \w sacrifice|strong="H5930"\w*, an offering made by \w fire|strong="H0801"\w*, of a \w sweet|strong="H5207"\w* \w savour|strong="H7381"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

¶ And if his \w offering|strong="H7133"\w* \add be\add* of the \w flocks|strong="H6629"\w*, \add namely\add*, of the \w sheep|strong="H3775"\w*, or of the \w goats|strong="H5795"\w*, for a burnt \w sacrifice|strong="H5930"\w*; he shall \w bring|strong="H7126"\w* it a \w male|strong="H2145"\w* without \w blemish|strong="H8549"\w*.

And he shall \w kill|strong="H7819"\w* it on the \w side|strong="H3409"\w* of the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* \w northward|strong="H6828"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*: and the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w*, \w Aaron’s|strong="H0175"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, shall \w sprinkle|strong="H2236"\w* his \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* round \w about|strong="H5439"\w* upon the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*.

And he shall \w cut|strong="H5408"\w* it into his \w pieces|strong="H5409"\w*, with his \w head|strong="H7218"\w* and his \w fat|strong="H6309"\w*: and the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* shall lay them in \w order|strong="H6186"\w* on the \w wood|strong="H6086"\w* that \add is\add* on the \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* which \add is\add* upon the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*:

But he shall \w wash|strong="H7364"\w* the \w inwards|strong="H7130"\w* and the \w legs|strong="H3767"\w* with \w water|strong="H4325"\w*: and the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* shall \w bring|strong="H7126"\w* \add it\add* all, and \w burn|strong="H6999"\w* \add it\add* upon the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*: it \add is\add* a burnt \w sacrifice|strong="H5930"\w*, an offering made by \w fire|strong="H0801"\w*, of a \w sweet|strong="H5207"\w* \w savour|strong="H7381"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

¶ And if the burnt \w sacrifice|strong="H5930"\w* for his \w offering|strong="H7133"\w* to the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \add be\add* of \w fowls|strong="H5775"\w*, then he shall \w bring|strong="H7126"\w* his \w offering|strong="H7133"\w* of \w turtledoves|strong="H8449"\w*, or of \w young|strong="H1121"\w* \w pigeons|strong="H3123"\w*.

And the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* shall \w bring|strong="H7126"\w* it unto the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*, and wring \w off|strong="H4454"\w* his \w head|strong="H7218"\w*, and \w burn|strong="H6999"\w* \add it\add* on the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*; and the \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* thereof shall be wrung \w out|strong="H4680"\w* at the \w side|strong="H7023"\w* of the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*:\f + \fr 1.15 \ft wring…: or, pinch off the head with the nail\f*

And he shall pluck \w away|strong="H5493"\w* his \w crop|strong="H4760"\w* with his \w feathers|strong="H5133"\w*, and \w cast|strong="H7993"\w* it \w beside|strong="H0681"\w* the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* on the east \w part|strong="H6924"\w*, by the \w place|strong="H4725"\w* of the \w ashes|strong="H1880"\w*:\f + \fr 1.16 \ft his feathers: or, the filth thereof\f*

And he shall \w cleave|strong="H8156"\w* it with the \w wings|strong="H3671"\w* thereof, \add but\add* shall not divide \add it\add* \w asunder|strong="H0914"\w*: and the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* shall \w burn|strong="H6999"\w* it upon the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*, upon the \w wood|strong="H6086"\w* that \add is\add* upon the \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*: it \add is\add* a burnt \w sacrifice|strong="H5930"\w*, an offering made by \w fire|strong="H0801"\w*, of a \w sweet|strong="H5207"\w* \w savour|strong="H7381"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.
